feed.title: Chirpy
feed.subtitle: A minimal, responsive, and powerful Jekyll theme for presenting professional writing.

entry.title: Past Lost Series
entry.summary: Irene had only just turned seventeen when her father sold her to Silvanus Aloysius Orpheus. A man of power. Someone never to be messed with. Anyone who dared defy him met death, most often in a brutal way. His father had founded the small village she lived in, and his son had taken over when he died due to illness. He was quite young to be in charge, at the age of nineteen, but no one spoke aga...
